Name: HMS Dulverton
awards:
Libya 1942
Sirte 1942
Mediterranean 1942
Malta Convoys 1942
Sicily 1943
Salerno 1943
Aegean 1943
Badge: On a Field barry wavy of six White and Blue within an annulet per fess Red and Green, a Griffin's claw erased Red grasping a riding whip and an axe in saltire Gold.
Armament:
6 × QF 4 in Mark XVI on twin mounts Mk. XIX
AAA – 2 × 4 12.7mm Vickers, 2 x 20 mm
6 Thornycroft depth charge throwers
